website_summaries.verdict: If you own a Keurig and want a good deal on basic coffee that has garnered a lot of fans for its flavor, this is a good pick for you.
pros: A popular choice among Keurig coffee maker owners, as you get 72 K-Cups for a reasonable price
Coffee flavor and aroma has been described as bold and flavorful
cons: While many consumers rave about the value and taste, some have griped that the coffee is stronger than they prefer
A few reports of some pods arriving unsealed

customer_reviews.title: Grounds spill out!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has loved drinking this for years. Recently we’ve had to strain about every third cup because they are not properly sealed and the grounds spill out. This also means we have to clean out our Keurig machine. I’m hoping it is just a fluke with the current box of 72. If not, a new coffee will be found. Original Dount Shop, please make this a 5 star rating again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal on many cups
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews after my purchase so when I opened my box I knew to what to look for. Sure enough at least three in each box have a broken seal is this something that we will be reimbursed for? We love this coffee but not sure it's worth the money to buy K-Cups if the seal be broken on this many.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the amount of pods you get. The coffee is great and it's nice that they come in smaller boxes so you can easily take them to work instead of putting them in a bad or whatever. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Davis

customer_reviews.title: One coffee tasted like the next to me
customer_reviews.text: I've never considered myself a coffee connoisseur by any means. One coffee tasted like the next to me. I've always purchased different brands hoping that one would stand out from the rest and finally I have found that brand! This coffee has a wonderful aroma while brewing which made me salivate just smelling it. The first sip all the way to the last sip was excellent. It has a smooth flavor without an overbearing bitter taste. I am now a dedicated Donut Shop coffee fan! Finally I found a coffee that stands out from the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: I've got my own receipe.
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor. Bold taste. The right brew for me is to first make 4 ounces on the Keurig Strong setting and when it is finished use the same pod and brew 8 additional ounces on the Normal setting. I have read that all decaffeinated coffee has some small percentage of caffine in it. Some decaf brands have more and some have less. I am unable to notice any amount of caffein in the The Donut Shop Decaf. Therefore it appears that it must be very low. I am very pleased with this decaf coffee
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Paint

customer_reviews.title: hate coffee grounds in my coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this coffee for many years, but from this order over 10% of them break top and coffee grounds get into my cup and have to use new k-cup. wasting too many k cups...
customer_reviews.author: Judy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a cigarette ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this coffee tastes 100% like a cigarette ashtray. I had to look it up to see if it was just me and it’s not. It turns out when very stale, coffee tastes like an ashtray/cigarettes. Not even creamer helped, it simply became hazelnut flavored ashes. Save yourself, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria McVay

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if there is some sort of weird mistake but this coffee taste like total dirt and I’ve already unboxed all of it ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this coffee all the time and honestly if you look at the picture on the website it says regular ......but on the box in the corner it says extra bold?? I don’t know if there is some sort of weird mistake but this coffee taste like total dirt and I’ve already unboxed all of it and dumped it in a bigger box for our business so I really can’t send it back but it should not be advertised as regular because it is so strong and bitter!
customer_reviews.author: T M

customer_reviews.title: A real mess
customer_reviews.text: For the first time ever, I had nothing but problems with these cups. When using any other cups, the coffee was fine. When using these cups, about one of every three would basically disintegrate in the coffee cup. There would be coffee grounds around the cup and a lot of grounds IN the coffee. I must say Amazon was amazing at taking care of the issue for me!
customer_reviews.author: cari49

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE  IMPOSSIBLE TO USE WITHOUT CLOGGING MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: While it imay be decent coffee, the pods clog my Keurig every time I use them. I can use Starbucks or Peets without an issue, but when I use these pods after 1 use ,I have to clean the machine inlets and run a cup of clear water every time before I can use the machine again. Even then the new pod clogs my machine.. Like a dummy O tried to keep using it, and now the return is invalid. Not happy Bad customer support Keurig!
customer_reviews.author: D., G. Menchetti

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: What was once my favorite coffee is now terrible! I will no longer waste money on this coffee. I am sad that I bought large amounts of it because I can't even choke it down. It use to be delicious, but this last time I purchased it it tastes bitter and gross, I even talked it up to my mom. She bought some and hates it. What happened to by wonderful Donut Shop coffee? It doesn't even brew right anymore. It drips out slowly, taking forever to finish, and leaves me with a cup full of grounds and tastes bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gumina

customer_reviews.title: It's terrible compared to what it once was!
customer_reviews.text: Donut-Shop used to be *great*, but has been getting worse and worse. It's been getting much slower going through the machine. Lately we've gotten only 1/2 cup of coffee every time we brew it (other brands work fine). This didn't happen with just one box; it's been getting worse through several shipments. We finally lost patience and took it off our Subscribe & Save list and got a refund for the last box. On a side note, I e-mailed Keurig about this and never heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim, Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The Original Donut Shop Keurig Single-Serve K-Cup Pods, Medium Roast Coffee in DECAF are the best pods I have found for our Keurig coffee maker. I crave caffeinated coffee but for health reasons I switched to decaf. Up until now this has not been satisfying. The Original Donut Shop Decaf is flavorful and smooth. No acid taste. I personally can't tell the difference from caffeinated coffee. As a matter of fact my wife who still drinks caffeinated can't tell the difference. So this is a thumbs up review and a full five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: raj from chicagoTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: Awful tasting coffee. I've bought this donut shop blend many times in the past but never thru amazon (perhaps bad batch?) The coffee has an awful bitter sour taste instead of the smooth blend that i've known donut shop to be. I've cleaned my keurig and descaled using the official liquid twice thinking it may have been the unit, but the coffee still tastes horrible. Too late for a refund, but I will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J4A72

customer_reviews.title: POP! GOES THE K-CUP ! WHAT A MESS !
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is ok, but this particular batch has had several cups explode in the maker, ruining the cup of coffee and making a large mess to clean in the maker. Not the best way to begin your day......especially without a cup of coffee in your system first ! Best by 20 Feb 2021 NA 19:36 PL099 9052 Update: Opened another box from this shipment and they too are exploding, though the k-cups I use (I drink decaf of the same brand) work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Kelzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this coffee. The flavor is perfect for us. I especially love that it comes in prepackaged boxes so you know your received the correct amount of pods. I had received other brands of coffee loose in a box. I was paying for the full amount of pods listed and I was always missing 1 or 2 pods. This is a good deal and great flavor. I only gave it 4 stars. Be aware that the larger container are more per pod than the smaller ones. Check your prices. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: No longer works like other pods
customer_reviews.text: Very strang. I’ve used these for years and generally like them. The last batch I got through subscribe and save doesn’t work. They start well, then slow way down. It’s a slow trickle then it stops with about 3/4 the coffee it should have made. Yes, it sounds like a stuck ground or like the machine needs cleaning, but that’s not the case. Going back and forth between different brands/ flavors , the others always work while this last batch of Donut Shop always goes wrong. Not sure what the deal is, but am very disappointed in their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: MO_TAG

customer_reviews.title: Broken and stale k-cups
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee so I can tell when there's something different with a batch! This 2-pack arrived half broken and all the k-cups tasted super stale. The box it came in was perfectly fine as was the other item I ordered this with. However, my box was full of coffee grounds cause somehow the cups were all loose like they hasn't been sealed correctly. So disappointed! I would've sent them back, but I thought the "ok" cups would be salvageable. Instead, they were so gross and stale.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gao

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I buy this coffee about once a month and have been for years. It's perfect for me because my wife likes a different brand and I only drink one or two cups so these single serving k-cups work perfectly. My daughter likes them too because she isn't a daily coffee drinker and likes being able to brew one cup at a time. Only drawback...occasionally I will get an entire 12 pack that was made incorrectly or something and I get a lot of coffee grounds in my cup. It's rare but I can't drink it like that. I end up pouring the whole cup out and usually several cups from the bad batch get dumped.
customer_reviews.author: Keith TD

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I was guided through a dream to drink coffee because it helps the Pineal Gland which I learned was true through research on the web. I also learned Decaf can do the same thing with a little chocolate. So, I began to experiment with different coffee's and Decaf coffee. I found this one works well for me with a smooth taste and great flavor. I normally buy these locally, but can't because people are still panic buying because of Corvid-19. As fast as the stocker's can fill the shelves their wiped out. I'm grateful to find them here at this price along with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jes_074

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my wife who loves them. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife who loves them. I think K-cups are way too expensive, though! The bulk buy from Amazon makes them a littl cheaper. I make my own for our Kurig coffee maker. Instead of paying $.50 to $.68 cents a cup, "rolling my own," so-to-speak, costs me $.06 a cup. Different strokes for different folks.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste, Weak flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tastes okay but the flavor is pretty weak. I prefer my coffee with a stronger flavor.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Kool-Aid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We won't be purchasing Original Donut Shop k-cups from Keurig. The last two orders were unsatisfactory. Too many k-cups were puffed on the bottom, which caused bursting of k-cups, grounds in coffee cup and Keurig had to be taken apart and cleaned almost as many times. A couple lids were slightly open. The coffee flavor is great and our earlier orders didn't have this problem. Maybe quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco

customer_reviews.title: Too many coffee grounds in my coffee!!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee brand and taste is great! However after ordering this online More than half of the pods came defective. When we made our coffee there where a tone of coffee grounds in my cup! Pretty much 3 out of 5 pods would have coffee grounds a week. It was like taking a gamble and hoping we would make a cup of coffee with no grounds in it. Shipping was super fast . I’m not sure if this was an old box or just a bad batch but I will never order my coffee from here again. I will stick to buying from the store. I have never had this issue buying this brand of coffee from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Hough

customer_reviews.title: Has anyone else had this problem? Donut Shop Coffee is my fav!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...I LOVE Donut Shop pods. I buy them regularly. But the pods in this last shipment are not right. I used the first one out of the box, and got nothing but wet grounds. I thought 'time to clean my machine and needle's. Nope. It happened again! And again! So after it happened the 4th time, I put a different brand of Keurig pod in. Worked perfectly. Hmmm. I'm asking could there be something wrong with these pods? My husband's Keurig Foldgers pods work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: BAD PODS
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Keurig machines for several years. I have also purchased Donut Shop coffee for a few years now. These coffee pods I purchased are FAULTY. After doing a google search, I learned others have had same problem and attempted different things to correct. I did everything noted..including pressing pod onto bottom needle FIRST to release extra air before closing lid. Nope, they are BAD PODS. I have put up with slow making coffee long enough. Keurig- We May BE DONE
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Another Defective K-Cup Review
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are cheaper than the ones you buy at Walmart but I think most of us know the reason behind why that is. Just about every cup of coffee I've had out of this last order has either had the top blown open sending coffee grounds all over the machine or would run through it's cycle with a bunch of coffee grounds in the cup. Think I'm going to start buying the reusable filters and coffee grounds. It'd probably be a lot cheaper that way anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Barker

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: With these particular K-cups, I find coffee grounds in my brewed coffee on a regularly basis (large enough to chew between teeth). Either the filters do not function properly or there are coffee grounds in the bottom of the K-cups. I have not had this issue with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Barely keeps me awake
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee, I drink it all the time. And yes kcups in general don’t speak to most coffee connoisseurs but it is also convenient. Despite that it does seem like using Kirkland instead of Donut Shop is better. I only got this for variety,but indeed the flavor is just mediocre. Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect medium roast!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee! It’s my every day coffee and I get it through subscribe and save. The medium roast has great flavor. I tend to do a bolder roast if I am buying from Starbucks or a coffee shop, but for at home this suits our family. If you just have one main coffee drinker in your house then the subscribe and save will last you longer than the “average” so don’t forget to adjust that. I forgot to change mine and got stocked up way more than needed for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: The best coffe there is 😍
customer_reviews.text: The best coffe there is 😍 Bold, strong, but bot overpowering. Not bitter. Not sweet either. Just right to add your poison of choice " white sugar" or whatnot, but the outcome is delicious! Had been buying this coffee for over 2 years for Kcup and I'm always bery pleased about the flavor of the coffee and the next day delivery right to my door, almost kitchen, where the coffee maker resides 😉 Highly recomended 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffee flavor - best we have found
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee out there. Even better than the manufacturer’s namesake line of coffees. Wish Green Mountain would sell THIS as loose ground coffee in bags/containers so I could make a full pot of this coffee. And also I could be more environmentally conscious and overall better value to buy ground coffee and use the ground coffee filter that came with my machine. Amazon has the best price available on these single cups!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste but hard Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so we are picky coffee drinkers in the taste of this is okay. It's not the best we've had but it's good! The problem is, the top of the Pod is harder than other brands and therefore it is really hard to put in our coffee system. Our Keurig is hooked up to ourrefrigerator and we've had a lot of problems with this specific brand so we can no longer use it. If you have a Keurig connected to your refrigerator, do not buy this brand..
customer_reviews.author: Kayti Stadler

customer_reviews.title: Initially these were great but the past few bulk batches I've ordered have ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially these were great but the past few bulk batches I've ordered have been vomiting coffee grains all into my coffee. It's obvious that the majority of the K cups are flattened up top when they should be a puffy air bubble. When opening the coffee maker, it's obvious that there is a leak or something going on because coffee grains are all over the place and this is through numerous boxes and batches that I've used. Definitely will be switching to another brand after these past few months of massive amounts of grains in my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: BSpang

customer_reviews.title: Great if you love coffee grounds floating in your cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Doughnut Shop Coffee and I normally don't have an issue with ones I buy in the store or Costco. But these I ordered through Amazon Subscribe and Save during the pandemic and 95% of the pods I have used so far have leaked a large amounts of grounds into my cup as well as clog up the needle in my brewer. I shouldn't have to run hot water through my brewer every time I make a cup of coffee. Make me wonder if the ones I received were not the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the first time. Just the regular flavor. Went by the fact that this was Amazon's best seller and a review on K-cup best coffees. I have to say I am not thrilled with it. Got the least amount to purchase but still a lot of coffee to drink. Not impressed with the flavor. Maybe it is just me but I am very fussy. Just not liking this very popular blend. I won't be drinking this again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Change my subscription
customer_reviews.text: I like the product fine. But I don't like your delivery schedule. I am supposed to get a shipment every 2 months. But this month, I got two shipments, a week apart. I now have 3 1/2 boxes of coffee. ...1 1/2 left from last month and the 2 from December. I don't use more than a box a month...don't drink that much coffee. I won't need another shipment until the end if March! Please adjust my subscription. Thank you. Audrey Adler
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, 11.4g coffee in the cups
customer_reviews.text: Having tried MANY K-cups around, most seem too weak, some too bitter, some just not right. These taste pretty good to me on the 8 oz. size brew. I signed up for subscribe and save on them. They are medium roast, but more grounds, so there is more flavor. If I could just slow down the K55 brewer so instead of 35 sec. it took, say, 45-60 seconds, then it would make an even better tasting brew.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Don't work in my Keurig it can't read them i've had to throw most of them away
customer_reviews.text: I won't order these again not sure if they are the real thing. My Keurig won't read the pods I have had to throw half the box away because I can't get my Keurig to read the top and dispense coffee. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's so much better than the regular
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I alway got the original doughnut shop coffee pods and when I was shopping on Amazon for more k cups I saw the dark roast and read reviews and figured I'd try it. I love it! It's so much better than the regular, if you haven't tried it you need to, your gonna love it! I didn't think I'd like it as much as I did, now there's no going back. You have to try this dark roast- you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Meet in the Middle
customer_reviews.text: Good all around medium bodied coffee that’s smooth and does the job. If you have several coffee drinkers in the home with different tastes, you should all be able to compromise happily here. 72 pack comes in a box with six 12 packs so that’s helpful for storage. Usually when I buy this quantity of any other brand it’s like 60-100 all thrown and scattered into a big box.
customer_reviews.author: Toolster

customer_reviews.title: Good abd bad. Cheap beans mixed in
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many K cup coffee brands but this one disappointed me most. This is why. The coffee is inconsistent. Each cup can vary from really good to pretty bad. This can only be because they must mix good beans with cheap beans. Get a batch of beans that are not mixed fully in with the good beans giving you good cups and bad. Not worth any price for dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Fills mug and machine with coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on the recommendation of a friend. I received them today and I have attempted to brew 5 kcups: 1 was fine, 1 had a teaspoon of grounds that I filtered out with a tea strainer, and 3 were not salvageable due to the grounds filling the mug. I wish I had not purchased the 72 pack to save some money. I will be going back to the more expensive, but functional cups from other brands. The wasted kcups and time spent cleaning out the machine is not worth the discount price of the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite coffee, I purchased 6 boxes for $43.96, makes them $7.33 for one 12 pod box, this to me is pricey since WHEN you can find it in stock at the local store it only goes for $5.99. But the coffee itself is fantastic, does not have a bitter taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: AZQueen

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Well, he has two, but this is one of them. I bought these because they were less expensive and had more pods than what I can find locally. I live in a small town, and I'm rural, so I do have some limited options for things. These are also on subscribe, I love that I don't "forget" to pick up more coffee at the store anymore, it's just there on my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: subscribe and save is great
customer_reviews.text: having coffee delivered regularly is perfect, if you're a regular coffee drinker. Always liked this brand...the only complaint is, it's not always 'fresh'. I'm not a coffee connoisseur, so I don't notice the taste difference, just that the pods are sometimes a bit too swollen...not enough so that I'll give up the convenience of delivery...
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: So at first I was skeptical to order more coffee on amazon. But let me tell you all something. I drank one cup of this and then I literally began walking 10X faster than most people. I went outside and I could see 100 miles away clearly. The stars at night looked like they were in my face. I stayed up for 22 days straight and everything around my house has been complete. I even Began selling this stuff on the street corners in zip lock bags. I’m pretty sure the FBI is onto me. So bye it now while it’s available 👍😊.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy foil top
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ordering this coffee. It seems like the foil top is flimsy and breaks too easily. I have grounds in my coffee every time I make a cup. Other than that it has good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee in the world can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee in the worldBest coffee in the world can't live without it. We have a large property and the mailman said it was in the mailbox and when it wasn't I flipped out turns out it was on the porch where it usually is so I'm sorry I jumped to conclusions I was out of coffee Not a good excuse for me thank you for forgiving me in advance
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W

customer_reviews.title: One of the Better Decafs Around
customer_reviews.text: One of the better decafs around, I buy this with the subscribe and save program. Because I need to drink decaf more, it helps to have a few great choices and Donut Shop is great. Some decafs have a weird taste to them that brands them immediately - Donut Shop always tastes great and fresh - the Keurig makes a difference with decaf, too. Each cup is a fresh one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Numinous Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today (that I have ordered before) but when I open the boxes to put in large basket, numerous pods were broken open causing the grounds to go everywhere. What a mess. It almost looked like there had been a large hole punched in numerous pods. Not a small hole but large enough to cause the coffee grounds to spill everywhere. This was not the quality I had grown to expect the this brand.
customer_reviews.author: debbie enders

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor, Can store and will retain fresh taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a big box with some pods still left after 12 months-No change in fresh taste! It is what it claims to be-similar to donut shop coffee. If you use only 4 oz. of water it is very close to expresso!
customer_reviews.author: TanaLV

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad batch, but now I am not even eligible ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open my coffee right away as I orderes it to ensure I'd have plenty of coffee for guests the following month. I realized that about half the cups I received aren't properly sealed, resulting in a big mess in my machine and lots of coffee hounds in each cup. Maybe I got a bad batch, but now I am not even eligible for return /replacement, so I thought a review would help others avoid getting stuck with cups that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: brianne Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like to try lots of different flavors and brands of coffee. This is the one that I always have on hand and is always my go to when i just want a good cup of coffee. So smooth and tastes great! I have had some pods have issues but I have never had any issues with these.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Don't confuse Donut Shop for Dunkin Donuts...
customer_reviews.text: Well... I did dumb impulse buy in three seconds and end up purchasing Donut Shop cups while believing that I was buying Dunkin Donuts. (not proud of it, being FOB and ESL didn't help either). Donut Shop coffee is fine if you have never tasted Dunkin Donuts or StarBucks. One you try those...it become hard to go back to Donut Shop. I feel like every time I make Donut Shop coffee I get 1/3 of water in the cup. There is just no texture, creaminess that Dunkin Donuts and StarBucks have. I shouldn't be complaining .... I got what I paid for! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nopi Herlina

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like this coffee!!! I have had my Keurig for years and don't typically by k-cups, but got the donut shop coffee on a sale. The flavor was nice and strong, and now my husband is bothering me to buy more. I do wish wish I could get this in a cannister instead of the k-cups though.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: A good coffee
customer_reviews.text: These are good coffees. My girlfriend loves these. They are a very good coffee, whether you are someone who drowns their coffee in cream and sugar, or whether you keep your coffee pure. As it should be. This coffee is good as a wake me up, or with sweets like cookies or donuts
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: AHHHMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this coffee and immediately fell in love with it. Amazon has the best prices on it. I checked the local supermarket and found the price to be more expensive. The taste of this coffee is just great and I plan on purchasing or even subscribing since I go through about three or 4 cups of coffee a day.
customer_reviews.author: Mac O

customer_reviews.title: An unknown brand has become my favorite k-cup coffee.  Go figure.
customer_reviews.text: Strangely enough this generic sounding coffee blend turns out to be the household favorite. I especially like it with a bit of cocoa powder for a poor-man's mocha. Normally I like the French Roasts in coffee shops for black coffee, but the k-cup french roasts are too strong and bitter for me. This is my favorite. It has a good drinking flavor, and a light but pleasing aftertaste which is important to me. I find I can drink it in the afternoon, which I haven't done for 20 years. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Beddow

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and the flavor. Nice for an afternoon break. Plus, I give it to my husband and he can’t tell it is decaf. (Yeah! He thinks he can always tell when I try to cut his caffeine) I also like getting it for a good price instead of waiting for store sales.
customer_reviews.author: n shish

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this, it tastes terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i gave it 2 stars is the delivery was exceptional, and was actually delivered on a Sunday! That aside, this is the worst tasting coffee. Definitely not coffee shop quality! Has an awful burnt taste, and extremely bitter, even with creamer and sweetener. Sad we purchased 3 large boxes, awful coffee for the Christmas season.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Pods Explode-Ruined my machine
customer_reviews.text: The last order I received was bad! The pods were nearly exploding with air before I put them in the machine. Then once in the machine, they appear to puncture ok, then they explode with a lot of grounds ending up in coffee cup as well as all over the area you put the pod into. Also, it appears there is some sort of resistance, as the water can hardly push through the pod, even though the machine is new.
customer_reviews.author: AStover

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee, and not too terribly expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to K-cup coffee. The price, while not the cheapest, is better than many of the famous brands, and it is simply delicious. It smells wonderful when you set that first cup brewing, and it tastes as good as it smells. I now look forward to getting to work and firing up my Mueller coffee maker! Guess I'll have to buy one for home too.
customer_reviews.author: pmb

customer_reviews.title: Product has become inconsistent and bitter.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and enjoyed this same coffee brand, Coffee Shop, and the same roast level for years but my last two orders have been bitter. Something changed and my friends say it’s not me. Too bad! This was good coffee and now it’s bitter and not worth drinking. Anybody want 65 cups of bitter?
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Decaf Coffee, Great Value - Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I never can find Decaf coffee in pods for a bulk price, so I appreciated Amazon for stocking these! I’m 5 months postpartum and am trying my best to avoid large amounts of caffeine. I thought these would come in a large box, but they actually came in small 12 pack boxes, which was great when I travel!
customer_reviews.author: Tony or Amanda

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these before and always received 6 boxes of 12 cups. This time 72 arrived in one large cardboard box. And the flavor is not the same These do not have the same great flavor that I am used to. Very disappointed. If the supplier is “Eddie Cool Digs”, go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J.

customer_reviews.title: Robust and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many brands of coffee for our Keurig, and this is, by far, the best. The flavor is rich without being too dark. The regular delivery is so convenient now that we have tweaked the frequency of the deliveries, which took a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: K cups
customer_reviews.text: The k cups are just what the doctor ordered, my wife and usually drink 3 cups of coffee per day. Have been using a typical drip type coffee pot for years but we always seemed to pour out coffee that didn't get drunk which is very wasteful. Thought we would try a different type coffee pot along with a different type coffee. Jackpot, we are very pleased with the results. Thank you Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get acidic. Bold fresh morning coffee.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this one. This is our morning coffee. This coffee does not become acidic with the passing of the hours. Sometimes I re-heat my same cup for up to three days and it still tastes good and fresh as it was just served. Have been drinking this one for years and haven’t changed it. Bold and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surely not flavorful.....
customer_reviews.text: Thought we would try a new brand of K.cup. This one was a poor choice. Some reviews stated that it was flavorful so we gave it a shot. On the machine we used the medium setting and was disappointed. We tried the smallest setting and it wasn't much better. All in all it wasn't so great. If you want a full bodied cup of coffee this one should not be the one you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Gail G Morrell

customer_reviews.title: My first cup of coffee every morning!
customer_reviews.text: I start every day with a cup of Original Donut Shop DARK and then move on to more medium flavors. This is my WAKE UP coffee. I really enjoy it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with this coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Order included six boxes of 12 of K-cups. The first 3 boxes were fine. When we opened the 4th box there was a bad bitter almost chemical taste to the coffee. We cleaned our brewer just in case it was the problem. Next pod, same taste. We tried another brand of coffee & it tasted fine. Tried a couple more Donut Shop pods and still the bad taste. Have written to Keurig twice with no response. Unable to return it as it has been more than 30 days since we purchased the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaG

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap coffee
customer_reviews.text: It's ok - no problems with packaging, just a standard K-cup. However, the coffee is by no means gourmet. Tastes like regular old pre-ground coffee out of a can. No distinctive flavors, pretty weak aroma and taste. It was certainly cheap, though. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Hollas

customer_reviews.title: Chase away my morning Witchy self
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite coffee. Perfect taste every cup. Not too bold and not too weak. Just right to chase away my morning witchy self and get ready to face the day without chopping off the head of the first person who dares to speak to me. Perfect amount of caffeine to keep me running without making my heart race too! My co-worker actually keeps tabs on how many K-cups I have in the break room and reminds me to order before I run out!
customer_reviews.author: TGilliland

customer_reviews.title: The taste is supreme!
customer_reviews.text: This is my #1 most favorite coffee...The Original Donut Shop Dark Keurig Single-Serve Roast Coffee...it is so yummy and full of delicious coffee full-bodied flavor. I enjoy each and every sip of it.
customer_reviews.author: JL Coppens

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: I drink a ton of coffee and my doctor told me to switch to decaf after 2 cups of caffeinated. I’ve tried several brands and this is my favorite. Not to strong, not bitter and it doesn’t leave that after taste. I ordered the large box and it came with a bunch of little boxes which was much easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rushing, Rushing To Meet Your Needs

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: For a decaf drinker, it's not too much % on the caffeine. Goes PERFECT with a morning Super Donut. Taste is great - makes teleworking during a pandemic go smoother. I've made the switch from drive through coffee to Donut Shop!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Figgatt

customer_reviews.title: Best overall K-Cup out there
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a coffee connoisseur ...I worked at Starbucks years ago and I love coffee. In my opinion this is the best K-Cup out there right now. It gives a good strong coffee flavor without the bitter flavor of beans that are roasted darker. This is pretty much all I drink now.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Different size boxes are not necessarily the same flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you change the size of the box you are choosing to buy. I bought these by mistake when I tried to choose a different flavor. I didn’t realize choosing a bigger box actually also chose a different flavor. But I kept them anyway because I love Donut Shop coffee. It just meant I got to order more in the other flavor too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Meow!

customer_reviews.title: Best Decaf EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered & received a whole box. I had tried a cup at my sister in laws house I couldn’t get over it that it Wasn’t regular COFFEE! I was so Stoked! Because all the decaf coffees I’ve ever tried taste like pure mud to me & I hate instant coffee it is horrible. I am currently suppose to drink decaf but I haven’t I’ve been drinking regular coffee until Now! I love this decaf Coffee it’s THE BEST! 🤘🏼
customer_reviews.author: Yours~Truly

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Special Supply shipped Kcups to me; Donut Shop and Barista French Roast in the same order. In both boxes there were pods that "blew out" when used in the Keurig. The Donut Shop brand box had more defective cups than Barista French Roast. Ir seemed that the top foil was not fastened snuggly to the plastic cup. Perhaps this was due to improper storage which caused the seal to weaken and release. Whatever the cause, I will avoid this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RHE

customer_reviews.title: A little weak but good value
customer_reviews.text: Totally a personal preference, but this didnt have much flavor and it is very mild in flavor. I wouldn't call it a medium roast. In fact if you are adding anything to this like sweetener or cream it won't taste like coffee much at all anymore. Nice to have in a pinch tho. Also only drinking decaf due to pregnancy so again it is a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy, price and delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product was one of my daughters Christmas gifts. Arrived as scheduled... with no issues. I personally, don’t care for it. It’s not the kind of coffee I drink. However, it is her favorite, along with one of my sisters. As a bonus, was an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mctigue

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money. The grocery stores sell less for way more. This isn’t coffee for a snob(it’s a k-cup after all) but great for the average consumer!! It came with the right amount, and none of them were deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ribali

customer_reviews.title: Best go to coffee
customer_reviews.text: I always have this coffee on hand. Even if I'm trying something new, this is always my go to. The flavor, aroma & taste is always great. At 6 oz it's a bit on the stronger side but that's my favorite & you can always brew 8 oz for a more smooth tasting great cup every time!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beware of bad batches.
customer_reviews.text: Bad batch? Every 4-5th pod is defective and I get a cup full of grinds. Extremely disappointing! I will never order from Amazon again. I have never had a problem with bad batches before, but throwing out 1-2 pods per package eliminates any cost savings I had buying on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: i buy these for my daughter who is away at college, she has a tiny Keurig and this flavor is her favorite. the price is comparable to everywhere else, although it is relatively expensive for a single cup of coffee. on the other hand, it is much more cost effective than going to a coffee shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a good every day coffee and has a smooth finish (not bitter at all). I typically like darker roasts but was pleasantly surprised. This is a medium roast coffee, not a dark roast as other reviewers have noted. My wife and I were thrilled to find this coffee, as she likes flavored, light roasts and I prefer unflavored, darker roasts. Donut Shop provides the perfect compromise, dark enough that I enjoy it but light enough that he can as well, and he can add flavoring to it to get his vanilla fix. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Taylor

customer_reviews.title: NOT Recyclable- One of the best reference coffee types i love, but not buying again
customer_reviews.text: Taste: Amazing, would love to stock up and buy as much as i can ( as long as it stays fresh) :) Verdict: WILL NOT BUY UNTIL these Kcups are recyclable. I watched myself producing HUGE loads of PLASTIC WASTE that CANNOT BE Recycled. I cant justify buying more Kcups for the sake of convenience. Bought some steel reusable Kcups and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VishNall

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff, I like the flavor and had no problems with the pods leaking. I'm not a picky coffee drinker but in the past purchased based on least expensive price only and decided I'll stay with this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dave b

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good simple coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the price for the pods and reminds me to going to a nice brunch place and having coffee on the side, personally I liked Peet’s major dickasons but again I like dark roast but this can be the best medium roast and the quantity is really great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Pods are defective.  Seal around top not good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor. Have purchased this brand in 2017 & 2018 with no problem but this last order received in 2019 had many defective pods. The seal around the outside top of the pod leaks and caused a huge mess of coffee grounds in my machine and coffee cup. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I( would send it back but my friend opened the box and used one of the K cups. I did not order 8 O'Clock coffee. I ordered donut Shop coffee. I will keep this one but I do not like getting the wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob407

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites.
customer_reviews.text: I live a 1/4 mile from the keriug distribution building. I can smell the coffee being poured and packaged into the kcups on a regular basis and boy does it smell fantastic. This kcup is not made locally, and I am generally a bit local kinda girl. I just love this flavor. It gives me a rush of nostalgia, to what I don’t know, but this is my favorite blend.
customer_reviews.author: Laureninvt

customer_reviews.title: Pods broke and grounds ended up in the cup
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was good. We have used Donut Shop before and always like it. Most of these pods were defective. All the grounds would end up in the cup. About 3/4 of the pods were like this. It clogged the Keurig and we had to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: primenana

customer_reviews.title: Read all the reviews- defective tops in numerous posts
customer_reviews.text: Amazon declined my first review. These pods are very thin on top, unlike others. Failure of in this manner pictured 4/5 attempts to use. Do not recommend - unless you like giving your money away. I bought 4 boxes, smh.
customer_reviews.author: WmVeteran

customer_reviews.title: Defective K-cups
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this coffee for some time now, but the last 2 orders had defective k-cups. The tops were flat and when I put them in to brew they exploded and the grounds were coming out with the coffee. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: My order contained only 6 pods in two of the boxes . ( 12 normal) . Very poor quality control . great taste however . Won't buy from them however . Will search web for a better source although probably a manufacture error not Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: bootucker

customer_reviews.title: Alot of defective cups.
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting coffee guys like it but alot of defective cups dumping grinds into cup.
customer_reviews.author: S. Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: EXPLODING PODS
customer_reviews.text: I also am having a problem with pods exploding In my keurig. Needless to say its a pain. I have started putting tape around the pod so this can't explode, it works. I pretty much can tell when the tape is needed. Shouldn't have too. What's going on? The first 3 orders this was not a problem till now.
customer_reviews.author: MDL405

product_meta.title: The Original Donut Shop Keurig Single-Serve K-Cup Pods, Regular Medium Roast Coffee, 72 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Original| Size:72 CountBefore coffee was complicated, great coffee was simply fresh, bold, and flavorful. This classic donut companion contains the highest quality Arabica beans... dunking is encouraged. Some people won’t admit it, but the best part of a donut is the coffee that goes with it. Without coffee, donuts are just another confection. But donut shop coffee? That’s a different story. The Original Donut Shop Coffee lingers on your tongue and warms the soul. It brightens your day like a big scoop of sprinkles. And who doesn’t like sprinkles? If you go through life as if it’s a sweet surprise filled with jelly and covered in frosting, The Original Donut Shop Coffee is for you.
feature_bullets: Extra bold (contains more coffee than regular K Cup pods)
Ensure high quality coffee every time with pods specially designed to work in Keurig brewers with exact grind and extraction

NOTE: This is a medium roast Extra Bold coffee, Extra Bold (contains more coffee than regular K Cup pods). Extra Bold does not pertain to the roast profile of the coffee. while using please pre puncture the bottom of the K Cup by lightly pressing down on it when placing it in the pod holder
Not too harsh, not too bitter just right

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
